English: I love to shop for clothes.
French: J'adore faire des courses de vêtements.

English: I wear jeans and a t-shirt every day.
French: J'porte des jeans et un tee-shirt tous les jours.

English: Do you like to wear hats?
I don't know how to sew, but I want to learn.
French: Je ne sais pas coudre, mais j'aimerais apprendre.
